parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Creates a [[Diary|diary]] entry. Supported tags and their parameters: <ext><name>spoiler</name><attr/><inner>
{{{!}} class{{=}}"wikitable sortable"
! Tag
!class{{=}}"unsortable" {{!}} Options
{{!}}-
{{!}} img
{{!}}
* ''image'': [[String]] - path to image. When present, any element with it will be displayed as image.
* ''width'': [[Number]] - image width in pixels.
* ''height'': [[Number]] - image height in pixels.
{{!}}-
{{!}} font
{{!}}
* ''color'': [[String]] - [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML_color HTML color] in format #aarrggbb or #rrggbb
* ''size'': [[Number]] - font height in pixels.
* ''face'': [[String]] - font type (class from CfgFontFamilies)
{{!}}-
{{!}} br
{{!}} {{n/a}}
{{!}}-
{{!}} marker
{{!}}
* ''name'': [[String]] - marker name
{{!}}-
{{!}} execute
{{!}}
* ''expression'': [[String]] - executed code
{{!}}-
{{!}} executeClose
{{!}}
* ''expression'': [[String]] - executed code, diary is closed afterwards
{{!}}-
{{!}} [[createDiaryLink|log]]
{{!}}
* ''subject'': [[String]] - [[createDiarySubject|subject]] name.
* ''record'': [[String]] - record name (e.g. "Record6" or "Unit1059524")
{{!}}-
{{!}} gear
{{!}}
* ''unit'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} teamSwitch
{{!}}
* ''unit'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} kick
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} ban
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} mute
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} currentTask
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - task ID
{{!}}}</inner><close></spoiler></close></ext>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> If [[createDiaryRecord]] command fails, it returns null record, but since there is no null record unary command, you can make a variable and compare against it.
 [[private]] _nullRecord <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[objNull]] [[createDiaryRecord]] [];
 [[if]] ([[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["title", "description"]] [[isEqualTo]] _nullRecord) [[then]] { [[hint]] "Failed" };
</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> player [[createDiaryRecord]] [subject, text, task, taskState, showTitle]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> player: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> subject: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> task: (Optional, default <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[taskNull]]</value></part></template>) - [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> taskState: [[String]] (Optional, default <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>?</value></part></template>) - Changes the state of the given task. Can be "NONE", "CREATED", "ASSIGNED", "SUCCEEDED", "FAILED", "CANCELED"

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> showTitle: [[Boolean]] (Optional, default <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[true]]</value></part></template>) - Whether or not to show title in the description section as well <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>yes</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Diary Record]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> player [[createDiaryRecord]] [subject, [title, text], task, taskState, showTitle]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> player : [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> subject: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> title: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> task: (Optional, default <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[taskNull]]</value></part></template>) - [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>p26</name>=<value> taskState: [[String]] (Optional, default <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>?</value></part></template>) - Changes the state of the given task. Can be "NONE", "CREATED", "ASSIGNED", "SUCCEEDED", "FAILED", "CANCELED"

</value></part><part><name>p27</name>=<value> showTitle: [[Boolean]] (Optional, default <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[true]]</value></part></template>) - Whether or not to show title in the description section as well <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>yes</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Diary Record]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Intel", "Enemy base is on grid <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><marker name='enemyBase'>161170</marker></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", "Information gathered.<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><br />&lt;img image='wellDone_ca.paa' /&gt;</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["No Title", "description"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Font tag","<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><font color='#7FFF00' size='30' face='TahomaB'>This will changed text size, colour and font</font></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "",[[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Image", "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><img image='\A3\Ui_F_Curator\Data\Logos\arma3_curator_artwork.jpg' width='500' height='800'/></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x6</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Linebreak","<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>Line1<br></br>Line2<br></br><br></br>Line4</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x7</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Execute","<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><execute expression='hint ""Some code"";'>Some text</execute></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x8</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["ExecuteClose", "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><executeClose expression=""hint 'Diary closed';"">Close Diary</executeClose></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryLink]] [[createDiarySubject]] [[diarySubjectExists]] [[setDiaryRecordText]] [[removeDiaryRecord]]
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 24, 2017 - 20:11 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
When adding multiple diary records, be aware that they appear in reverse order. ie the first one you add will appear last and the last one you add will be first.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 22, 2019 - 16:28 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:R3vo|R3vo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
It seems that the '''task''' parameter has no effect in <template><title>arma3</title></template> because the task entry in the briefing menu is created when the task itself was created.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
